title: Banned
body:
I just got banned after 1 slightly toxic game where I had a Darius on my team that was intentionally feeding. This is ridiculous, I think this should be brought to attention as this just shows how poor the Riot Games banning system really is.
Thanks, Mastrcheef.

Link to his op.gg:

replies.body:
Unfortunately for both of you, it doesn't matter, Riot basically holds a stance of "trolls can do whatever they want, if they don't use chat it's fine"

And unfortunately, you aren't allowed to be toxic towards them, or else your then in the crosshairs, because it's toxicity, and context doesn't matter.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=2VJzrPEE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-08T04:55:50.622+0000)
>
> Unfortunately for both of you, it doesn't matter, Riot basically holds a stance of "trolls can do whatever they want, if they don't use chat it's fine"
> 
> And unfortunately, you aren't allowed to be toxic towards them, or else your then in the crosshairs, because it's toxicity, and context doesn't matter.

This is the big problem right now. So many players with honour ribbons are getting banned / suspended because of rage towards a feeder / inter / griefer but the griefers just carry on and get nothing because the chatbots dont catch them swearing.

Maybe the chatbot should be tweaked - in stead of banning people who are swearing, ban the people who are consistently sworn at.
Riot need to seriously think about their banning system, it's absolutely terrible.
Riot doesn't just perma-banned after one report, you've had to had previous report for it to get to that point
you can literally get perma banned for TWO games. you can play hundreds and even thousands of games and they will ban you permanently because of TWO games you said a bad word in.
Yea no. The only way that can happen is if you do shit like death threats and telling people to kill them self’s, you won’t be perma banned after just 2 games for calling someone trash
incorrect. if you say the word "%%%' or "kys" and get reported, you can literally get perma banned after 2 games.
So are you agreeing with me or not since I said the exact same thing

My main account that I had for 5 years spent almost 2000 dollars on just got banned! Yeah right ok, I said a few bad words but I wasn't the only one! I know for a fact that A friend of mine is the most toxic player in OCE ( even worse then tyler1) and he is a racist to boot and has had multiple warnings and he still gets to keep his account!!! Seems like riot just pick and choose who that want to ban and who they don't!! I for one will never purchase RP again! Oh, they banned me just on preseason...#whatajoke
I was in this game and i can confirm that this Darius was INT feeding and running it down mid/bot constantly.
1 death in the mid and two in the bot lane. He's really running it down and just feeding isn't he

The only time intentionally feeding will get a ban is if the person is 0/10 or worse in multiple games. Usually people like that get picked up and auto banned. People who feed but still farm and get kills are only going to get penalised if they are toxic or have 5+ games where they got 3+ bans in a row.

>The only time intentionally feeding will get a ban is if the person is 0/10 or worse in multiple games.

(READ: like 50+ games.)
On his OP.GG doesn't look like he's inting as Darius
Not those games you see on op.gg, it's the most recent game that wont load.
Then whats the point of linking OP.GG :P

Did you report the Darius? 

If so, leave it to the riot report team to follow up.

Can you link the game that he 'inted' on because I can't find it. 

Being toxic is in no way tolerable if you have 'bad' team mates. Don't use the excuse of being toxic due to bad teamates as a way out of your ban and the reason for your behaviour.
